******************
MOOG_SCAT Routines
******************

There is one common block and a few subroutines that are only present in the SCAT version of the MOOG code:

- Scat.com (common block)

- Ang_Weight_SCAT.f (subroutine to assist in the solution of radiative transfer)

- Gauss_Quad_Sum.f (subroutine to assist in the solution of radiative transfer)

- Sourcefunc_cont_SCAT.f (subroutine to compute continuum source function)

- Sourcefunc_line_SCAT.f (subroutine to calculate line source function)
